entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
